item.title: CVNA
item.description: score:11 Chances: Carvana debuts same-day vehicle delivery for speed and convenience. Carvana expands footprint with new iconic car vending machine. Carvana boosts profit forecast as turnaround gains momentum. Carvana updates Q3 2023 outlook with increased adjusted EBITDA.
